column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We went here with a large group - 12 people
column2: all vegetarian.  We had plenty to eat
column3: lots of variety of plates and desserts
column4: which all came out quickly and in intervals.  Plus a ton of sangria that was just right
column5: not overly sweet and not bitter...  After all of this delicious food
column6: we only paid $18 per person!  Call way ahead if you have a large reservation
column7: though - I called on Tuesday for a Saturday reservation and we had to eat at 10pm!
